alert.note: Alert for McLean; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 08 at 11:17AM EST until March 12 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Kentucky... Green River at Paradise and Calhoun. .Recent rainfall in the basin has caused additional rises on the Green River and, at Paradise and Calhoun, a crest in minor flooding is forecast at both locations midweek. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 22.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 23.3 feet Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
